mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TItemInfoMgmt(ItemName, ItemPrice, AdminNo, FileName ,FileUrl ) VALUES( #{strItemName}, #{intItemPrice}, #{intAdminNo}, #{strfileName}, #{strfileUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT ItemNo AS intItemNo ,ItemName AS strItemName ,ItemPrice AS intItemPrice ,ItemDate AS dateItemDate ,AdminName AS strAdminName ,UpdateAdminNo AS intUpdateAdminNo FROM TItemInfoMgmt INNER JOIN TAdmin ON TItemInfoMgmt.AdminNo = TAdmin.AdminNo ORDER BY ItemDate DESC
SELECT ItemNo AS intItemNo ,ItemName AS strItemName ,ItemPrice AS intItemPrice ,FileName AS strfileName FROM TItemInfoMgmt WHERE ItemNo NOT IN(0) ORDER BY ItemDate DESC
